name: Rounding Setting
description: Controls the location of the part visualization in the first phase of placement

options.name: Dynamic
options.description: The part visualization is rounded to the cursor position

options.name: Constant
options.description: The part visualization is rounded to the center face

options.name: No rounding
options.description:
The part visualization is set to be at the center face 
This causes even-width blocks to not be on grid
